theWeaponMaster:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
theWeaponMaster:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

theWeaponMaster:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
theWeaponMaster:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
theWeaponMaster:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

theWeaponMaster:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theWeaponMaster:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

theWeaponMaster:DefaultAttackWithVariabl.NAME: Special Strike
theWeaponMaster:DefaultAttackWithVariabl.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !theWeaponMaster:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

theWeaponMaster:DefaultSecondMagicNumber.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
theWeaponMaster:DefaultSecondMagicNumber.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and 4 poison to an enemy.

theWeaponMaster:FenrirLacerate.NAME: Lacerate
theWeaponMaster:FenrirLacerate.DESCRIPTION: Fenrir NL Deal !D! damage. Apply !M! Lacerate. NL Evolve: Hit enemies with Hemorrhage or 3+ Lacerate.
theWeaponMaster:FenrirLacerate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Fenrir NL Take !M! damage and deal !D! damage. Apply !M! Lacerate. Deal 10% bonus damage per Lacerate stack. NL Evolve: Attack enemy with Hemorrhage.

theWeaponMaster:FenrirShieldEater.NAME: Shield Eater
theWeaponMaster:FenrirShieldEater.DESCRIPTION: Fenrir NL Deal !D! damage and absorb an equal amount of block. NL Evolve: Destroy all enemy Block.

theWeaponMaster:FenrirDefensiveStance.NAME: Defensive Stance
theWeaponMaster:FenrirDefensiveStance.DESCRIPTION: Fenrir NL Gain !B! Block and Defensive Stance. Lose 20% of this block whenever you play a Fenrir card. NL Evolve: All enemies intend to attack you.

theWeaponMaster:FenrirHeavySwing.NAME: Heavy Swing
theWeaponMaster:FenrirHeavySwing.DESCRIPTION: Fenrir NL Deal !D! damage per card in your hand, gains half the Evolution bonuses. NL Evolve: Play holding 3 or fewer cards.

theWeaponMaster:FenrirUnleashed.NAME: Fenrir Unleashed
theWeaponMaster:FenrirUnleashed.DESCRIPTION: Fenrir NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies, one after another. Overkill. NL Evolve: Kill an opponent.
theWeaponMaster:FenrirUnleashed.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Fenrir NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies, one after another. Overkill. NL Evolve: Every time you kill an opponent.

theWeaponMaster:CerberusSlash.NAME: Slash
theWeaponMaster:CerberusSlash.DESCRIPTION: Cerberus NL not_implemented NL Deal !D! damage. NL Quickdraw 1.
theWeaponMaster:CerberusSlash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Cerberus NL not_implemented NL Deal !D! plus !M! bonus damage for every card you discard. NL Quickdraw 1.

theWeaponMaster:CerberusEssenceSlash.NAME: Essence Slash
theWeaponMaster:CerberusEssenceSlash.DESCRIPTION: Cerberus NL not_implemented NL Deal !D! damage. Enemies take !M! damage for every buff they have. NL Quickdraw 1.

theWeaponMaster:CerberusIaiSlash.NAME: Iai Slash
theWeaponMaster:CerberusIaiSlash.DESCRIPTION: Cerberus NL Deal !D! damage. Discards !M! random cards to deal 2 bonus damage each. NL Quickdraw 2.
theWeaponMaster:CerberusIaiSlash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Cerberus NL Deal !D! damage. Discards !M! random cards to deal 2 bonus damage each. NL Quickdraw 2.

theWeaponMaster:CerberusDrainSlash.NAME: Drain Slash
theWeaponMaster:CerberusDrainSlash.DESCRIPTION: Cerberus NL not_implemented NL Deal !D! damage. Exhaust one card and steal !M! random enemy buff. NL Quickdraw 1.
theWeaponMaster:CerberusDrainSlash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Legendary Weapon NL not_implemented NL Deal !D! damage. Exhaust one card and steal !M! random enemy buffs. NL Quickdraw 1.

theWeaponMaster:LeviathanCrush.NAME: Crush
theWeaponMaster:LeviathanCrush.DESCRIPTION: Leviathan_Gauntlet NL Armor_Break NL Hit the enemy for !D! damage. NL Take quarter damage if they don't block.
theWeaponMaster:LeviathanCrush.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Legendary_Weapon NL Armor_Break, Crush NL Hit the enemy for !D! damage. NL Take quarter damage if they don't block.

theWeaponMaster:LeviathanEject.NAME: Eject
theWeaponMaster:LeviathanEject.DESCRIPTION: Leviathan_Gauntlet NL Eject all spent Leviathan cartridges and deal !D! damage X times to random enemies.
theWeaponMaster:LeviathanEject.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Eject all spent Leviathan cartridges and deal !D! damage X times to random enemies.

theWeaponMaster:LeviathanReload.NAME: Reload
theWeaponMaster:LeviathanReload.DESCIRPTION: Leviathan_Gauntlet NL Reload your Gauntlet and gain !B! block.
theWeaponMaster:LeviathanReload.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Leviathan_Gauntlet NL Reload your Gauntlet and gain !B! block.

theWeaponMaster:LeviathanGroundSplitter.NAME: Ground Splitter
theWeaponMaster:LeviathanGroundSplitter.DESCRIPTION: Leviathan_Gauntlet NL Stagger all enemy cards depending on their total block for two turns.
theWeaponMaster:LeviathanGroundSplitter.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Stagger all enemy cards depending on their total block for three turns.

theWeaponMaster:LeviathanDeepImpact.NAME: Deep Impact
theWeaponMaster:LeviathanDeepImpact.DESCRIPTION: Leviathan_Gauntlet NL Deal !D! damage to the first enemy. Continue: Enemy Block. NL Deal !M! bonus damage and attack the enemy behind it.

theWeaponMaster:LeviathanEarthquake.NAME: Earthquake
theWeaponMaster:LeviathanEarthquake.DESCRIPTION: Leviathan_Gauntlet NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies, ignores thorns.

theWeaponMaster:RevenantRavenous.NAME: Ravenous
theWeaponMaster:RevenantRavenous.DESCRIPTION: Revenant_Cleaver NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Vicious.

theWeaponMaster:RevenantChopChopCHOP.NAME: Chop Chop CHOP
theWeaponMaster:RevenantChopChopCHOP.DESCRIPTION: Revenant_Cleaver NL Deal !D! damage and gain 1 temporary HP !M! times.

theWeaponMaster:RevenantHungrySteel.NAME: Hungry Steel
theWeaponMaster:RevenantHungrySteel.DESCRIPTION: Revenant_Cleaver NL Deal !D! damage and apply Hungering. NL Gain !M! Vicious.

theWeaponMaster:RevenantBloodbath.NAME: Bloodbath
theWeaponMaster:RevenantBloodbath.DESCRIPTION: Revenant_Cleaver NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. Continue: 5+ Vicious.

theWeaponMaster:AtroposSeveredSource.NAME: Severed Source
theWeaponMaster:AtroposSeveredSource.DESCRIPTION: Atropos_Shears NL Deal !D! damage to your target and apply 1 Mana_Burn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Legendary_Weapon NL Deal !D! damage to your target and apply 1 Mana_Burn.
Legendary_Weapon NL not_implemented - Deal full Manablaze damage to your target and remove Manablaze.

theWeaponMaster:AtroposSeveredScissors.NAME: Severed Scissors
theWeaponMaster:AtroposSeveredScissors.DESCRIPTION: Atropos_Shears NL Deal !D! damage twice. NL Igniting 1.
theWeaponMaster:AtroposSeveredScissors.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Atropos_Shears NL Deal !D! damage twice. NL Igniting 2.

theWeaponMaster:AtroposScissorHalf.NAME: Scissor Half
theWeaponMaster:AtroposScissorHalf.DESCRIPTION: Atropos_Shears NL Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !M! bonus damage if the last card was Severed Scissors or Scissor Half. NL Igniting 1.
theWeaponMaster:AtroposScissorHalf.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Atropos_Shears NL Deal !D! damage. Deal !M! bonus damage if the last card was Severed Scissors or Scissor Half. NL Igniting 1.

theWeaponMaster:AtroposSeveredPath.NAME: Severed Path
theWeaponMaster:AtroposSeveredPath.DESCRIPTION: Atropos_Shears NL Target Enemy attacks itself this turn.

theWeaponMaster:AtroposSeveredPain.NAME: Severed Pain
theWeaponMaster:AtroposSeveredPain.DESCRIPTION: Atropos_Shears NL Reduce all damage you take by half until your next turn.
theWeaponMaster:AtroposSeveredPain.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Reduce all damage you take by half for two turns.

theWeaponMaster:AtroposSeveredSoul.NAME: Severed Soul
theWeaponMaster:AtroposSeveredSoul.DESCRIPTION: Atropos_Shears NL Can only be played as the first card of your turn. Deal massive damage.

theWeaponMaster:RevolverLowRecoil.NAME: Low Recoil Shot
theWeaponMaster:RevolverLowRecoil.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Play the top card if it's a Revolver card.

theWeaponMaster:RevolverFullMetal.NAME: Full Metal Jacket Shot
theWeaponMaster:RevolverFullMetal.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Deal !M!% bonus damage to enemies with Block.

theWeaponMaster:RevolverHollowPoint.NAME: Hollow-Point Shot
theWeaponMaster:RevolverHollowPoint.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Deal !M!% bonus damage to enemies without Block.

theWeaponMaster:BullyIntimidate.NAME: Intimidate
theWeaponMaster:BullyIntimidate.DESCRIPTION: Bully NL Force an attacking enemy to defend.

theWeaponMaster:BullyTaunt.NAME: Taunt
theWeaponMaster:BullyTaunt.DESCRIPTION: Bully NL Force a defending enemy to attack.

theWeaponMaster:BullyHuh.NAME: HUH?!
theWeaponMaster:BullyHuh.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Bully 7 NL Gain !M! Artifact, gain !B! block.

theWeaponMaster:BullyWimp.NAME: Wimp
theWeaponMaster:BullyWimp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Bully 6 NL Apply !M! Weak to all enemies.

theWeaponMaster:BullySlap.NAME: Slap
theWeaponMaster:BullySlap.DESCRIPTION: Bully 5 NL Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Frail.
theWeaponMaster:BullySlap.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Bully 5 NL Deal !D! damage damage twice each and apply !M! Frail.

theWeaponMaster:BullyMeanToEveryone.NAME: Mean to everyone!
theWeaponMaster:BullyMeanToEveryone.DESCRIPTION: Bully NL Taunt all enemies. They gain !M! Strength and you gain !M! Strength for every applied Taunt.

theWeaponMaster:BullyTerrifyingHowl.NAME: Terrifying Howl
theWeaponMaster:BullyTerrifyingHowl.DESCRIPTION: Bully NL Force all attacking enemies to defend.

theWeaponMaster:BullyDinerArgument.NAME: Diner Argument
theWeaponMaster:BullyDinerArgument.DESCRIPTION: Bully NL Can only be played as the first card. NL Force every enemy to take a random action.

theWeaponMaster:BullyShakedown.NAME: Shakedown
theWeaponMaster:BullyShakedown.DESCRIPTION: Bully NL Deal !D! damage. Target enemy 'donates' a little random amount of gold (3-6 Gold).
theWeaponMaster:BullyShakedown.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Bully NL Deal !D! damage. Target enemy 'donates' a little random amount of gold (6-9 Gold).
